long_description: So small and light that you may hardly notice you're wearing it, the Granite Gear Chilaca 22 Pack features a detachable hipbelt and large front mesh pocket that is perfect for stashing a jacket. Padded shoulder straps; detachable webbing hipbelt; sternum strap with buckle that works as a whistle. Mesh front pocket; dual bottle holsters; internal zippered pocket; external zippered pockets. Trekking pole attachment. The Granite Gear Chilaca 22 Pack features a hydration port and sleeve (reservoir sold separately). Closeout.
short_description: So small and light that you may hardly notice you're wearing it, the Granite Gear Chilaca 22 Pack features a detachable hipbelt and large front mesh pocket that is perfect for stashing a jacket.
